H:4900 M:5500 E:100% W:100% B:100% XP:22% [sdb eb lr] You have the following active defences: You walk with the grace of the stars. You are protected from the fangs of serpents. [Defs]: Resolved sileris defense. Your vision is heightened to see in the dark. [Defs]: Resolved nightsight defense. You are blind. You are feeling extremely energetic. [Defs]: Resolved kola defense. You are disregarding your personal safety. You have insomnia, and cannot easily go to sleep. [Defs]: Resolved insomnia defense. You are deaf. You are utilising your bodily control to make yourself more fit. [Defs]: Resolved fitness defense. The blessing of Epicurus is protecting you. You are diverting upset attacks. You are dodging upset attacks. You are immune to normal weather. [Defs]: Resolved weathering defense. Your skin is toughened. [Defs]: Resolved toughness defense. You are resisting magical damage. [Defs]: Resolved resistance defense. You have the warmth of a Yeleni. Your mind has been touched by the essence of the Underking. [Defs]: Resolved deathsight defense. Your resistance to damage by poison has been increased. [Defs]: Resolved venom defense. Your hands are gripping your wielded items tightly. [Defs]: Resolved gripping defense. You will attempt to parry attacks to your head with your left arm. You will attempt to parry attacks to your left leg with your right arm. You possess the sight of the third eye. [Defs]: Resolved thirdeye defense. Your sense of time is heightened, and your reactions are speeded. [Defs]: Resolved speed defense. You walk on a small cushion of air. [Defs]: Resolved levitation defense. Your senses are magically heightened. [Defs]: Resolved mindseye defense. You are riding a donkey. [Defs]: Resolved mounted defense. You are protected by 26 defences. (road) --- Area 29: The Fields of Valor -- v2349 --- [ ]-[ ] / \ \ [ ] [ ] [ ]- / / \ \ [ ]-[ ] [ ]-[ ] [ ] \ \ | / \ | \ [ ]-[ ] [ ] | | | | [ ] [+]-[ ] [^]- - -[ ] \ / \ \ [ ] [ ] [ ] | | | [ ]-[ ]-[ ] [ ]- - -[ ] \ | | / \ [ ] [ ] [ ]- --- Arena Path outside the Caves - -1:0:0 --- The path darkens here as it approaches a wide cavern entrance within a sheer rock face. The great expanse of the caverns is an ominous presence, though the path into it is heavily worn. The outer wall of the arena connects to the side of the great stone surrounding the caves in a seamless groove. A falcon is perched here, its bright eyes regarding its surroundings watchfully. You see exits leading east and southwest. H:4900 M:5500 E:100% W:100% B:100% XP:22% [sdb -b lr] You have recovered equilibrium. Earl Tyrock Voltaire ------------------------------------------------------------------------------- General: He is 20 years old. He was born on the 19th of Variach, year 290 of the Midnight Age. He is ranked 320th in Aetolia. He is the 60th ranked combatant with a rating of 183. He is a Rambler in the Fellowship of Explorers. He is a member of the clan called 'The Blood Progression'. He is a member of the clan called 'The Voltaire Judicar'. He is a Private in the army of Bloodloch. H:4596 M:4075 E:89% W:94% B:100% XP:22% [sdb e- lr] He is a muscular Human vampire and stands at six feet tall. The brown skin visible on his arms and legs has strange runic markings that have been burned into his flesh. His black hair stops at his neck in the back, and is kept trimmed in the front allowing a few strands to fall down the outskirts of his face. His crimson eyes look out on the world with determination. He is wearing: a suit of scale mail a dark hooded cloak of House Voltaire roughshod black leather boots a pair of men's casual black slacks a crimson shirt a silver crown a necklace of purity 2 gold stud earrings a lunar eclipse medallion a spun flame ring a silver ring an interwoven shadow ring a bound lightning ring He walks with the blessing of Ivoln. (road) --- Area 29: The Fields of Valor -- v2349 --- [ ]-[ ] / \ \ [ ] [ ] [ ]- / / \ \ [ ]-[ ] [ ]-[ ] [ ] \ \ | / \ | \ [ ]-[ ] [ ] | | | | [ ] [+]-[ ] [^]- - -[ ] \ / \ \ [ ] [ ] [ ] | | | [ ]-[ ]-[ ] [ ]- - -[ ] \ | | / \ [ ] [ ] [ ]- --- Arena Path outside the Caves - -1:0:0 --- The path darkens here as it approaches a wide cavern entrance within a sheer rock face. The great expanse of the caverns is an ominous presence, though the path into it is heavily worn. The outer wall of the arena connects to the side of the great stone surrounding the caves in a seamless groove. A falcon is perched here, its bright eyes regarding its surroundings watchfully. Earl Tyrock Voltaire is here. He wields a steel Theran broadsword in his left hand and a tower shield in his right. You see exits leading east and southwest. H:4900 M:5450 E:78% W:90% B:100% XP:22% [sdb e- lr] look tyrock He is a muscular Human vampire and stands at six feet tall. The brown skin visible on his arms and legs has strange runic markings that have been burned into his flesh. His black hair stops at his neck in the back, and is kept trimmed in the front allowing a few strands to fall down the outskirts of his face. His crimson eyes look out on the world with determination. He is wearing: a suit of scale mail a dark hooded cloak of House Voltaire roughshod black leather boots a pair of men's casual black slacks a crimson shirt a silver crown a necklace of purity 2 gold stud earrings a lunar eclipse medallion a spun flame ring a silver ring an interwoven shadow ring a bound lightning ring He walks with the blessing of Ivoln. (road) --- Area 29: The Fields of Valor -- v2349 --- [ ]-[ ] / \ \ [ ] [ ] [ ]- / / \ \ [ ]-[ ] [ ]-[ ] [ ] \ \ | / \ | \ [ ]-[ ] [ ] | | | | [ ] [+]-[ ] [^]- - -[ ] \ / \ \ [ ] [ ] [ ] | | | [ ]-[ ]-[ ] [ ]- - -[ ] \ | | / \ [ ] [ ] [ ]- --- Arena Path outside the Caves - -1:0:0 --- The path darkens here as it approaches a wide cavern entrance within a sheer rock face. The great expanse of the caverns is an ominous presence, though the path into it is heavily worn. The outer wall of the arena connects to the side of the great stone surrounding the caves in a seamless groove. A falcon is perched here, its bright eyes regarding its surroundings watchfully. Earl Tyrock Voltaire is here. He wields a steel Theran broadsword in his left hand and a tower shield in his right. You see exits leading east and southwest. A long row of pedestals runs in front of the benches, each holding an odd, glowing, green globe. A falcon is perched here, its bright eyes regarding its surroundings watchfully. H:4900 M:5500 E:100% W:100% B:100% XP:22% [sdb eb lr] look tyrock He is a muscular Human vampire and stands at six feet tall. The brown skin visible on his arms and legs has strange runic markings that have been burned into his flesh. His black hair stops at his neck in the back, and is kept trimmed in the front allowing a few strands to fall down the outskirts of his face. His crimson eyes look out on the world with determination. H:4900 M:5500 E:100% W:100% B:100% XP:22% [sdb eb lr] look me He is a dexterous Yeleni and is a translucent being radiating a soft silvery light. The rays emanating from his form seem almost tangibly solid though ephemeral. His height oscillates from six to ten feet as the light emanating from him waxes and wanes. The Seal of Oloren - a rising argent sun glows brilliantly from the center of his chest, the brightness of which waxes and wanes as well. His eyes lack an iris or pupil, instead tiny motes of brilliant white light coalesce and disperse as his gaze shifts. Ethereal ribbon-like wings composed entirely of light extend from his back, drifting as though buffeted by unseen winds. He is wearing: an amber ring etched with flames a shadowdrop earring an inscribed mithril ring an amber ring etched with icicles a crisp, white shirt of the Paladins a classy pair of white pants an amber ring etched with lightning bolts a tower shield an elegant black silk top hat a black skull armband a pair of sturdy leather boots a powerful yew darkbow a leather falconry glove a blue, leather Paladin's weaponbelt a canvas backpack a shimmering suit of full plate armour a Royal Enorian Army soldier's quiver He walks with the blessing of Dhar. Many rows of benches rise at a steep angle, affording a commanding view of this historical arena and all the varied environments it contains. A long row of pedestals runs in front of the benches, each holding an odd, glowing, green globe. A falcon is perched here, its bright eyes regarding its surroundings watchfully. Earl Tyrock Voltaire is here. He wields a steel Theran broadsword in his left hand and a tower shield in his right. You see exits leading northeast and east.
